nodes.text: Verazeen stones were a set of stones used for decision-making. Users would toss them to help with making decisions, leaving the results up to chance. One side of the stones were engraved with sun symbols, and the other side with moons. They would be thrown on the ground, and the user would decide what to do based on whether more suns or moons were visible. The former Jedi and mercenary Ty Yorrick used to make decisions with the stones.
